commits.subject: feat: add PDF export and shareable links (Priority 4)
commits.body:
Add export/share capabilities to the dashboard:

- PDF Export: Generate downloadable PDF of current tab view
  - Uses html2pdf.js for client-side generation
  - Includes header, stats, and chart content
  - Landscape A4 format with loading feedback

- Shareable Links: Copy URL with encoded state
  - Captures tab, filters, period, timezone settings
  - Auto-applies URL state on page load
  - Toast notifications for user feedback

- UI: Header buttons (Share + Export PDF)
  - Responsive layout (icons on mobile)
  - Buttons appear after data loads

Completes all Discovery Session priorities (1-4).

commits.subject: Merge pull request #13 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-summary-by-tag-2NyWg
commits.body: fix: Summary tab zeros and tag display order inconsistency

commits.subject: fix: Summary tab zeros and tag display order inconsistency
commits.body:
- Fix date range comparison to include full day (commits after midnight)
- Add endOfDay() helper to set end times to 23:59:59.999
- Sort tags by count before rendering chart for consistent order
- Update docs with fix details

commits.subject: Merge pull request #12 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-project-list-display-1RCBF
commits.body: fix: add cache-busting to prevent stale data.json on GitHub Pages

commits.subject: fix: add cache-busting to prevent stale data.json on GitHub Pages
commits.body:
Appends git commit hash as query parameter during deployment to ensure
browsers always fetch the latest data file after each deployment.

commits.subject: chore: re-extract all repos with tag-based format
commits.body:
- Extracted 561 commits across 4 repos (model-pear, social-ad-creator, repo-tor, chatty-chart)
- All data now uses tags[] and complexity fields
- Foundation phase complete

commits.subject: Merge pull request #10 from devmade-ai/claude/start-todos-feature-ykdyO
commits.body: feat: add Timing tab with hour and day-of-week charts

commits.subject: feat: add Executive Summary tab with period comparison
commits.body:
Add new Summary tab as default view for executive quick scanning:
- Period selector (week/month/quarter vs previous)
- Quick stats cards with trend indicators (↑/↓ %)
- Work breakdown doughnut chart
- Key highlights (top contributor, busiest day, etc.)
- Activity snapshot (avg/day, after-hours, weekend, holiday)

commits.subject: feat: add work pattern styling with SA holidays
commits.body:
Add visual indicators for commits made outside normal work hours:
- After Hours badge (amber) for commits before 8am or after 5pm
- Weekend badge (indigo) for Saturday/Sunday commits
- Holiday badge (pink) for SA public holidays
- Legend in Timeline tab explaining badge meanings
